## Problem / use-case

What problem are you trying to solve, or what workflow is currently painful?

## Proposed solution

How would you like Trackkit to behave?  
If relevant, include pseudo-code or configuration examples.

```ts
// hypothetical API
const analytics = createAnalytics({ ... });
```

## Alternatives considered

Have you tried any workarounds? Why are they insufficient?

Anything else that might be useful (links, prior art, provider docs, etc.).
